scripts.db-save: docker exec -it planit_postgres pg_dump -U planit planit | gzip > ./api/resources/database_data.tar.gz
scripts.predb-load: docker exec -i planit_postgres psql -U planit planit -c "DROP SCHEMA public CASCADE; CREATE SCHEMA public;"
scripts.db-load: cat ./api/resources/database_data.tar.gz | gunzip | docker exec -i planit_postgres psql -U planit planit
scripts.db-exec: docker exec -it planit_postgres psql -U planit planit
scripts.lint: docker exec -i planit_app npm run lint
scripts.prettier: docker exec -i planit_app npm run prettier
